channel.title: Help me with my prob plz
channel.description: ok so i got rune x bow working but dragon bolts can only be spawned 1 by 1 and dont stack up how do i make it stack up someone plz help also is there a way to make dragon bolts(e) a spec att not with bow but like real rs bolt spec.. o and onemore thing is there a emote id for how a xbow shots i got it running on the karils bow one ;[
